description: BR-31 is the District Transport Office for the Vaishali district, headquartered in the strategically located city of Hajipur, Bihar. This office is responsible for vehicle registration, licensing, and road safety enforcement in a region that serves as a vital gateway connecting North Bihar to the state capital via the Mahatma Gandhi Setu. It manages a significant volume of commercial and agricultural traffic, serving one of the state's most important trading and historical hubs.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Hajipur, Vaishali, Bihar
